overview:
Drip Drop, Inc. is a medical start-up dedicated to the scientific advancement and application of oral rehydration solutions (ORS).

The result of years of research, Drip DropÂ® ORS is an advanced form of ORS that builds upon The World Health Organization’s oral rehydration therapy standards.

Key Facts:

Drip Drop ORS, packaged in portable packets, is used by the military, ultra-endurance athletes, the chronically ill, children with diarrhea, and elderly patients with acute gastroenteritis. Originally developed by Dr. Dolhun to be palatable for dehydrated children during medical relief missions, Drip Drop’s humanitarian efforts have resulted in Drip Drop ORS being used by thousands of children and adults.

ORS therapies are credited with saving millions of lives a year worldwide, and can prevent the need for intravenous (IV) fluid therapy. 200,000 children are hospitalized every year in the US for dehydration–most can be avoided with ORS therapy.

David Zezza, Partner at Pacific Advantage Capital, commented, “Our investment in Drip Drop is consistent with our focus of investing in innovative pharmaceutical and medical consumer companies. Drip Drop ORS addresses the needs of medical professionals and other end users looking for a safe and effective product to treat dehydration.”

Oral rehydration therapy has been heralded by the medical journal, The Lancet, as “possibly the most important medical understanding of the 20th century,” yet remains underutilized in the U.S. due, in Drip Drop’s view, to poor taste and lack of consumer awareness.

About Drip Drop:

Founded in 2008, Drip Drop, Inc. is a medical start-up improving the taste of ORS. Dr. Eduardo Dolhun, a practicing family physician and Stanford University lecturer, conceived the idea while studying at the Mayo Clinic. He later leveraged his expertise to produce and refine a better tasting medically relevant oral rehydration solution.

To learn more, please visit www.DripDropORS.com .
